extendedInfo.description: Start banking wherever you are with Chemung Canal Trust Companyâs fast, secure and free* mobile banking application. Access all of the same services you currently enjoy in Online Banking from the convenience of your mobile device with 24/7 access.All mobile data transmissions are safeguarded by 128-bit SSL (Secure Socket Layer) to prevent unauthorized access. We will not save your password, account numbers, transaction information or balances on your mobile device.CCTC Mobile is available to all Chemung Canal Online Banking customers. Simply use your current Online Banking login information to begin managing your money at your convenience.MONITOR YOUR ACCOUNT:â¢View account balances, recent transactions and pending depositsâ¢View detailed transactions history and images of posted checksPERFORM TRANSACTIONSâ¢Transfer money between Chemung Canal accountsâ¢Schedule payments and pay billsâ¢Send money using the Person-to-Person Popmoney featureFIND BRANCHES & ATM LOCATIONSâ¢Locate Chemung Canal branch offices using your current location or enter the address or zip code of the area you wish to search. A list of all branch offices and ATM terminals will be displayed along with the address and distance from your current location. Each listing will offer details of service and provide a map of the located area.RECEIVE ALERTSâ¢ Customize notifications that can be sent directly to your mobile device for tracking and monitoring purposes. Receive notifications for low balance, deposits made, wire transfers, VISA check cards purchases and much more.Support:Have questions or need help? Contact our Teleservices department by phone at (800) 836-3711 or find us on Facebook.About Chemung Canal Trust Company:Chemung Canal Trust Company is an independent community bank which has served the financial needs of businesses and individuals for over 175 years. We trace our roots to the opening of our namesake, the Chemung Canal, in 1833. Today, we operate 28 branch offices in 8 New York State counties and 1 Pennsylvania county. Most important, we remain steadfast to our community banking philosophy and business model which means we build long-term relationships with our clients and play a vital role in the communities we serve.* Your mobile carrierâs message and data rates may apply.

reviews.title: Maybe a little too simple if an app
reviews.comment: A more clear picture of what the account looks like would be nice....not just a running log of deposits and withdraws.  Having a running balance rather than just the amount in the listed at the top would help out.  Also, the ability to click on a transaction (like a check) so you can see what it is.  I don\'t run around all day with my ledger in hand so being able to see the check that cleared while on the road would be great.
reviews.author: Kristina McLain

reviews.title: Barely useful
reviews.comment: Have to give this one a poor rating as it\'s unusable for me in its current state. Can\'t paste in any fields, can\'t multi task (if you leave the app you must log back in) and calendar doesn\'t tell the day of week.
reviews.author: kevan nelson

reviews.title: Capital Bank customer
reviews.comment: Great app, works with no problems and very user friendly. Thanks
reviews.author: Gregory Bruno

reviews.title: Nexus7
reviews.comment: Thanks, now I can check my account without booting up my PC.
reviews.author: Robert Stone

reviews.title: Log in needs improvement
reviews.comment: Too many times the app won\'t recognize your password and you have to retry until you get in or get locked out.  ......LIKE NOW !!
reviews.author: Daryl Davis
